description:
With the summer fest lineup decided, the girls practice hard at a camp. They have to perform their own unit songs as well as a new group song. Seeing them struggle, Minami cancels the group lesson and initiates an athletic meet as a "special program"!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Magic Needed for a Flower to Bloom.
The Magic Needed for a Flower to Bloom.
The magic needed for a flower to bloom.
